From: i(BLOOMBERG/ NEWSROOM:

To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS)  
Subject: the safe on Epstein's private island.... 
Just wanted to make sure your team saw this reference in today's story to a 
super-secret safe in Epstein's island getaway: 
https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2019-07-12/jeffrey-epstein-s-
private-island-in-the-caribbean-has-gone-guiet?srnd=premium 
"The level of secrecy around a steel safe in Epstein's office, in 
particular, suggested it contained much more than just money, he said. 
Outside of an occasional visit by a housekeeper, no one was allowed 
in 
those rooms." 
Bloomberg News 
EFTA00023242
